code: import{GET_ITEMS,ADD_ITEM,DELETE_ITEM,ITEMS_LOADING,SHOW_MORE}from"./types";import axios from"axios";import{tokenConfig}from"../actions/authActions";import{returnErrors}from"../actions/errorActions";export var getItems=function getItems(){return function(dispatch){dispatch(setItemsLoading());axios.get("/api/items").then(function(res){return dispatch({type:GET_ITEMS,payload:res.data});}).catch(function(err){return dispatch(returnErrors(err.response.data,err.response.status));});};};export var deleteItem=function deleteItem(id){return function(dispatch,getState){axios.delete("/api/items/".concat(id),tokenConfig(getState)).then(function(res){return dispatch({type:DELETE_ITEM,payload:id});}).catch(function(err){return dispatch(returnErrors(err.response.data,err.response.status));});};};export var addItem=function addItem(item){return function(dispatch,getState){axios.post("/api/items",item,tokenConfig(getState)).then(function(res){return dispatch({type:ADD_ITEM,payload:res.data});}).catch(function(err){return dispatch(returnErrors(err.response.data,err.response.status));});};};export var handleShow=function handleShow(item){return{type:SHOW_MORE,payload:item};};export var setItemsLoading=function setItemsLoading(){return{type:ITEMS_LOADING};};
